item.title: Anotha One
item.description: Anotha One This is also a post This one I did (mostly) by myself

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World! You have found yourself inside the online nexus of Thomas James Alexander’s digital memory banks. Thomas was educated by North Carolina State University (BAE Dept rankings) as a Biological Engineer with a concentration in Bioprocessing. A Biological Engineer’s training is a rigorous as any other engineer but with the exception that we are trained to design devices that cater to the needs and exploit the benefits of living systems.
